3 namespace iauv_motion_planner

5  ScanPlanner::ScanPlanner(ros::NodeHandle &nh) : Planner(nh)
6  {
7  planner_name = "ScanPlanner";
8  params_["width"] = 5;
9  params_["length"] = 5;
10  std::cout << "loaded scan planner\n";
11  }
12 
13  void ScanPlanner::forward(Eigen::Isometry3d mov, int steps)
14  {
15  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
16  for (int i = 0; i < steps; i++)
17  {
18  next_ = next_ * mov;
19  auto q = Eigen::Quaterniond(next_.rotation());
20  pose = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
21  pose.pose.position.x = next_.translation().x();
22  pose.pose.position.y = next_.translation().y();
23  pose.pose.position.z = next_.translation().z();
24  pose.pose.orientation.x = q.x();
25  pose.pose.orientation.y = q.y();
26  pose.pose.orientation.z = q.z();
27  pose.pose.orientation.w = q.w();
28  path_.poses.push_back(pose);
29  }
30  }
31 
32  nav_msgs::Path ScanPlanner::doPlan(std::vector<double> center)
33  {
34 
35  width_ = params_["width"];
36  length_ = params_["length"];
37  // std::cout << "scanarea of width and length: " << width << ", " << length << "\n";
38 
39  // path_ = nav_msgs::Path();
40  // path_.header.frame_id = "map";
41 
42  Eigen::Isometry3d centerT(Eigen::Translation3d(center[0], center[1], center[2]) *
43  Eigen::AngleAxisd(center[3], Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
44 
45  Eigen::Isometry3d startT(Eigen::Translation3d(-length_ / 2, -width_ / 2, 0));
46  Eigen::Isometry3d goalT(Eigen::Translation3d(length_ / 2, width_ / 2, 0));
47 
48  Eigen::Isometry3d start_pose = centerT * startT;
49  Eigen::Quaterniond startq(start_pose.rotation());
50 
51  Eigen::Isometry3d end_pose = centerT * goalT;
52  Eigen::Quaterniond endq(end_pose.rotation());
53 
54  auto diff = start_pose.inverse() * end_pose;
55 
56  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
57  pose.pose.position.x = start_pose.translation()[0];
58  pose.pose.position.y = start_pose.translation()[1];
59  pose.pose.position.z = start_pose.translation()[2];
60  pose.pose.orientation.x = startq.x();
61  pose.pose.orientation.y = startq.y();
62  pose.pose.orientation.z = startq.z();
63  pose.pose.orientation.w = startq.w();
64  path_.poses.push_back(pose);
65 
66  double dist = 0.5;
67  int steps_x = length_ / dist;
68  int steps_y = 1.5 / dist;
69  // std::cout << diff.translation() << "\n";
70  // std::cout << diff.translation() / dist << "\n";
71  // std::cout << steps_x << "\n";
72  // std::cout << steps_y << "\n";
73 
74  // forward
75  Eigen::Isometry3d fwd;
76  fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(dist, 0, 0);
77  next_ = start_pose;
78  forward(fwd, steps_x);
79 
80  double dir = 1;
81  double times = diff.translation()[1] / (dist * steps_y) - 1;
82  for (size_t i = 0; i <= times; i++)
83  {
84  // turn
85  fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(0, 0, 0) * Eigen::AngleAxisd(1.57 * dir, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
86  next_ = next_ * fwd;
87  // forward
88  fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(dist, 0, 0);
89  forward(fwd, steps_y);
90  // turn
91  fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(0, 0, 0) * Eigen::AngleAxisd(1.57 * dir, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
92  next_ = next_ * fwd;
93  // forward
94  fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(dist, 0, 0);
95  forward(fwd, steps_x);
96 
97  dir *= -1;
98  }
99 
100  diff = next_.inverse() * end_pose;
101  // std::cout << "reaminder diff \n" << diff.translation() << "\n";
102  int steps_last_x;
103  int steps_last_y;
104  if (dir > 0)
105  {
106  steps_last_x = abs(diff.translation()[0] / dist);
107  steps_last_y = abs(diff.translation()[1] / dist);
108 
109  // turn
110  fwd = Eigen::AngleAxisd(1.57 * dir, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
111  next_ = next_ * fwd;
112  // forward
113  fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(dist, 0, 0);
114  forward(fwd, steps_last_x);
115  // turn
116  fwd = Eigen::AngleAxisd(0, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
117  next_ = next_ * fwd;
118  // forward
119  fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(dist, 0, 0);
120  forward(fwd, steps_last_y);
121  }
122  else
123  {
124  steps_last_x = abs(diff.translation()[1] / dist);
125  steps_last_y = abs(diff.translation()[0] / dist);
126  // turn
127  fwd = Eigen::AngleAxisd(1.57 * dir, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
128  next_ = next_ * fwd;
129  // forward
130  fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(dist, 0, 0);
131  forward(fwd, steps_last_x);
132  // turn
133  fwd = Eigen::AngleAxisd(1.57 * dir, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
134  next_ = next_ * fwd;
135  // forward
136  fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(dist, 0, 0);
137  forward(fwd, steps_last_y);
138  }
139 
140  // std::cout << steps_last_y << "\n";
141 
142  pose = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
143  pose.pose.position.x = end_pose.translation()[0];
144  pose.pose.position.y = end_pose.translation()[1];
145  pose.pose.position.z = end_pose.translation()[2];
146  pose.pose.orientation.x = endq.x();
147  pose.pose.orientation.y = endq.y();
148  pose.pose.orientation.z = endq.z();
149  pose.pose.orientation.w = endq.w();
150 
151  path_.poses.push_back(pose);
152 
153  return path_;
154  }
155 }
